casebody.data:
IN RE: ACCUTANE LITIGATION (Hoffmann-La Roche Inc. and Roche Laboratories Inc.-Petitioners) C-388 September Term 2017
079958 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 8, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-4698-14 and A-910-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
